FIELD.COMMENT: The library we first instanciate for this node

FIELD.NAME: content_type
FIELD.COMMENT: Content type as defined in h5p.json

FIELD.NAME: author
FIELD.COMMENT: Author as defined in h5p.json

FIELD.NAME: license
FIELD.COMMENT: License as defined in h5p.json

FIELD.NAME: meta_keywords
FIELD.COMMENT: Keywords as defined in h5p.json

FIELD.COMMENT: Meta description as defined in h5p.json

TABLE.NAME: hvp_content_user_data
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores user data about the content

FIELD.NAME: user_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Id for the user answering this H5P

FIELD.NAME: hvp_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of hvp content in the 'hvp' table

FIELD.NAME: sub_content_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Subcontent id of hvp content, 0 if this is not subcontent

FIELD.NAME: data_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The data type identifier

FIELD.NAME: data
FIELD.COMMENT: The actual user data that was stored.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Primary Key: The id of the library

FIELD.NAME: machine_name
FIELD.COMMENT: The library machine name

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: The human readable name of this library

FIELD.NAME: runnable
FIELD.COMMENT: Can this library be started by the module? i.e. not a dependency.

FIELD.NAME: fullscreen
FIELD.COMMENT: Display fullscreen button

FIELD.NAME: preloaded_js
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma separated list of scripts to load.

FIELD.NAME: preloaded_css
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma separated list of stylesheets to load.

FIELD.NAME: drop_library_css
FIELD.COMMENT: List of libraries that should not have CSS included if this library is used. Comma separated list.

FIELD.NAME: semantics
FIELD.COMMENT: The semantics definition in json format

FIELD.NAME: restricted
FIELD.COMMENT: Restricts the ability to create new content using this library

FIELD.NAME: tutorial_url
FIELD.COMMENT: URL to a tutorial for this library

FIELD.NAME: library_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Primary Key: The id of a H5P library.

FIELD.NAME: required_library_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The dependency to load

FIELD.NAME: dependency_type
FIELD.COMMENT: 'preloaded, dynamic, or editor'

FIELD.NAME: language_json
FIELD.COMMENT: The translations defined in json format

TABLE.NAME: hvp_libraries_cachedassets
TABLE.COMMENT: Use to know which caches to clear when a library is updated

TABLE.NAME: hvp_contents_libraries
TABLE.COMMENT: Store which library is used in which content.

FIELD.NAME: hvp_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifier for a content found from the 'hvp' table

FIELD.NAME: library_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The identifier of a H5P library this content uses

FIELD.NAME: dependency_type
FIELD.COMMENT: dynamic, preloaded or editor

FIELD.NAME: drop_css
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 if the preloaded css from the dependency is to be excluded

FIELD.NAME: weight
FIELD.COMMENT: Determines the order in which the preloaded libraries will be loaded
